metadata.dc:author: Cifuentes, S
Sánchez Pernaute, R
Sánchez Cascos, A
metadata.dc:description: We report a child affected with the Romano-Ward syndrome (long QT, normal hearing), born from a mother affected with the Jervell and Lange-Nielsen syndrome (long QT plus deafmutism). We discuss the possible pathogenetic reasons for this uncommon association.
metadata.dc:title: Niño afecto de síndrome de Romano-Ward nacido de madre afecta de síndrome de Jervell y Lange-Nielsen.
[A child affected by the Romano-Ward syndrome born of a mother with the Jervell and Lange-Nielsen syndrome].
